Frequently Asked Questions

How can I change my personal information? (i.e., name, password, email address)

Click on “Edit Profile” at the top of the screen to open the “Edit Profile” screen. On the “Edit Profile” screen you can change your name, password, and email address.

How do I add a new level?

From your Home screen, click on “Add a Level.” Follow the steps to add a new level. You will need an access code for each new level you want to add.

How do I listen to the audio and watch the video for my book?

From your Home screen select your level. Select “Media Player” and then the file you want to play.

How do I join a class?

If you did not enter a class ID code during registration, select “Join a Class” from the menu at the top of the screen. Enter your class ID code and select “Save”. You can get your class ID code from your teacher.

How do I change class?

Select your level, then select “Change Class” from the menu at the top of the screen. Enter your new class ID code and select “Save”. You can get your class ID code from your teacher.

Do I have to join a class?

No. You can use On The Move without joining a class.

Why can’t I hear my audio?

There are a few reasons why you may not be able to hear your audio.

  1. In the volume settings on your device, check that your volume is up and not muted.
  2. Did you unplug your headphones? Unplugging your headphones after loading the website or while playing an audio track may cause the audio player to stop working. To solve the problem, close your browser completely and then restart the program.

Where can I go if I need more help?

For additional support, email ELTsupport@oup.com. Please include the following information in your email:

  • Your type of device (for example, iPad or Samsung Galaxy S6)
  • Your operating system (for example, iOS9)
  • Your browser (for example, Safari)
  • A description of the problem, including any specific actions that were taken before the problem occurred.
